title.zh_CN: Words of Wisdom delivered at The Temple Of Ultimate Bliss of Tainan Taiwan—To Save Chinese Traditional Culture is to Save Humanity
title.zh_TW: Words of Wisdom delivered at The Temple Of Ultimate Bliss of Tainan Taiwan—To Save Chinese Traditional Culture is to Save Humanity

paragraphs.zh_CN: It is important to incorporate religion, in an educational framework.
paragraphs.zh_TW: It is important to incorporate religion, in an educational framework.

paragraphs.zh_CN: The British are doing this now.
paragraphs.zh_TW: The British are doing this now.

paragraphs.zh_CN: The Prince of Wales is directing every religion to an educational framework.
paragraphs.zh_TW: The Prince of Wales is directing every religion to an educational framework.

paragraphs.zh_CN: This is perfectly correct.
paragraphs.zh_TW: This is perfectly correct.

paragraphs.zh_CN: People take religion to be superstition.
paragraphs.zh_TW: People take religion to be superstition.

paragraphs.zh_CN: The fact is: religion itself is education.
paragraphs.zh_TW: The fact is: religion itself is education.

paragraphs.zh_CN: What kind of education?
paragraphs.zh_TW: What kind of education?

paragraphs.zh_CN: The education of love.
paragraphs.zh_TW: The education of love.

paragraphs.zh_CN: " God loves humanity ",hence, the education of love.
paragraphs.zh_TW: " God loves humanity ",hence, the education of love.

paragraphs.zh_CN: This is great!
paragraphs.zh_TW: This is great!

paragraphs.zh_CN: He's rather active in this, he's dedicated to training teachers.
paragraphs.zh_TW: He's rather active in this, he's dedicated to training teachers.

paragraphs.zh_CN: Nowadays teachers are generally in very short supply, it’s the same both in the East and the West.
paragraphs.zh_TW: Nowadays teachers are generally in very short supply, it’s the same both in the East and the West.

paragraphs.zh_CN: To set up schools is no problem but where do you find the teachers?
paragraphs.zh_TW: To set up schools is no problem but where do you find the teachers?

paragraphs.zh_CN: There're no teachers, So, to train teachers must be the priority.
paragraphs.zh_TW: There're no teachers, So, to train teachers must be the priority.

paragraphs.zh_CN: To start a " PhD in Harmony " programme in the University, it'll take 3 years to complete a doctorate programme.
paragraphs.zh_TW: To start a " PhD in Harmony " programme in the University, it'll take 3 years to complete a doctorate programme.

paragraphs.zh_CN: In practice these Doctors of Philosophy in Harmony will be the Religion Instructors of their own faith.
paragraphs.zh_TW: In practice these Doctors of Philosophy in Harmony will be the Religion Instructors of their own faith.

paragraphs.zh_CN: They must explain the religion texts clearly and accurately.
paragraphs.zh_TW: They must explain the religion texts clearly and accurately.

paragraphs.zh_CN: Then relying on God's teachings, they should find God's love and store it in their own heart.
paragraphs.zh_TW: Then relying on God's teachings, they should find God's love and store it in their own heart.

paragraphs.zh_CN: Everyone will then learn to put God's love into practice by loving each other.
paragraphs.zh_TW: Everyone will then learn to put God's love into practice by loving each other.

paragraphs.zh_CN: God's love is unbiased.
paragraphs.zh_TW: God's love is unbiased.

paragraphs.zh_CN: It doesn't involve choice or preference.
paragraphs.zh_TW: It doesn't involve choice or preference.

paragraphs.zh_CN: It's love that is fair, genuine and unconditional.
paragraphs.zh_TW: It's love that is fair, genuine and unconditional.

paragraphs.zh_CN: This is a great idea!
paragraphs.zh_TW: This is a great idea!

paragraphs.zh_CN: So the main purpose of setting up this 3-year Ph.D. programme is to train religious officials recommended by every religion.
paragraphs.zh_TW: So the main purpose of setting up this 3-year Ph.D. programme is to train religious officials recommended by every religion.

paragraphs.zh_CN: We reckon there will be at least 30 holders of a doctorate in Harmony in 3 years' time.
paragraphs.zh_TW: We reckon there will be at least 30 holders of a doctorate in Harmony in 3 years' time.

paragraphs.zh_CN: That means there will be 30 Religion Instructors.
paragraphs.zh_TW: That means there will be 30 Religion Instructors.

paragraphs.zh_CN: So regardless of their individual faith, they will all pass on the message of universal love.
paragraphs.zh_TW: So regardless of their individual faith, they will all pass on the message of universal love.

paragraphs.zh_CN: After successfully training 30 teachers in 3 years' time, we can upgrade the School and proceed to set up the College of Religion Education.
paragraphs.zh_TW: After successfully training 30 teachers in 3 years' time, we can upgrade the School and proceed to set up the College of Religion Education.

paragraphs.zh_CN: We'll have by then 30 teachers.
paragraphs.zh_TW: We'll have by then 30 teachers.

paragraphs.zh_CN: That'll do.
paragraphs.zh_TW: That'll do.

paragraphs.zh_CN: The College of Religion Education is actually the University of Religion.
paragraphs.zh_TW: The College of Religion Education is actually the University of Religion.

paragraphs.zh_CN: It's called a College and not a University because there aren't that many teachers.
paragraphs.zh_TW: It's called a College and not a University because there aren't that many teachers.

paragraphs.zh_CN: It'll take 7 years to graduate.
paragraphs.zh_TW: It'll take 7 years to graduate.

paragraphs.zh_CN: We reckon that in 7 years' time we can successfully train 100 to 150 Religion Instructors who will have obtained their doctorate and will be able to lecture on their respective religious texts.
paragraphs.zh_TW: We reckon that in 7 years' time we can successfully train 100 to 150 Religion Instructors who will have obtained their doctorate and will be able to lecture on their respective religious texts.

paragraphs.zh_CN: With as many as 100 to 150 teachers, we can then formally establish a University of Religion
paragraphs.zh_TW: With as many as 100 to 150 teachers, we can then formally establish a University of Religion

paragraphs.zh_CN: to help the Religion Instructors of every faith in the world to obtain their doctorate and be qualified as professors.
paragraphs.zh_TW: to help the Religion Instructors of every faith in the world to obtain their doctorate and be qualified as professors.

paragraphs.zh_CN: And so the first University will be set up.
paragraphs.zh_TW: And so the first University will be set up.

paragraphs.zh_CN: That's a good thing.
paragraphs.zh_TW: That's a good thing.

paragraphs.zh_CN: The British take a pragmatic approach, starting with teacher-training.
paragraphs.zh_TW: The British take a pragmatic approach, starting with teacher-training.

paragraphs.zh_CN: In 10 years' time there will be sufficient teaching staff and the University of Religion will then materialize.
paragraphs.zh_TW: In 10 years' time there will be sufficient teaching staff and the University of Religion will then materialize.

paragraphs.zh_CN: To save Chinese traditional culture is to save humanity.
paragraphs.zh_TW: To save Chinese traditional culture is to save humanity.

paragraphs.zh_CN: It is logical and admirable for Chinese to learn Confucianism, Buddhism and Taoism as these are their heritage.
paragraphs.zh_TW: It is logical and admirable for Chinese to learn Confucianism, Buddhism and Taoism as these are their heritage.

paragraphs.zh_CN: This is about saving the world, the sacred mission.
paragraphs.zh_TW: This is about saving the world, the sacred mission.

paragraphs.zh_CN: It is no trivial matter.
paragraphs.zh_TW: It is no trivial matter.

paragraphs.zh_CN: For ourselves, it would suffice so long we have enough food to eat and enough clothing to keep warm.
paragraphs.zh_TW: For ourselves, it would suffice so long we have enough food to eat and enough clothing to keep warm.

paragraphs.zh_CN: What bliss!
paragraphs.zh_TW: What bliss!

paragraphs.zh_CN: To save the culture, to save humanity!
paragraphs.zh_TW: To save the culture, to save humanity!
